data.message: Eminem you are the greatest rapper of the past, present, and future. I will never not buy your music as long as you continue to speak about real world issues instead of how many drugs you can take. When i was going through withdrawal I could put on your music and tolerate any pain.

replies.message: Eminem is trash mgk is better as a matter as a fact my dog is better
You know MGK has trashed trump as well? I like how staunch you are in your opinion, but MGK did not help me through a very difficult time.
Every Eminem album ever has had political commentary on it.

Same here Christopher Rocchio... Was sitting in a mental hospital detoxing off opiates when Not Afraid came out. Watched the video on the lobby tv and gained immeasurable resolve. That whole album got me through my first 6 months clean. I'm a forever fan.

Lol just your state of mind you can get off drugs or anything you want to 😂😂😂😂😂😂😂 "i got through rehab after being addicted to meth for seven years THANKS TO EMINEM 😂😂😂😂😂"  I'm not afraid I'm not afraid to stop poping pills 😏😏😏😏😭😭😭😭

And sometimes it takes an outside source to change the state of the mind. You could use one. I can tell from your comment that you have an egotistical viewpoint on everyone else. When you fail at something it will hit you harder than a freight train barreling down the tracks and there will be no stopping it. Then you will realise just how hard it is to change your state of mind from negative to positive. 

 I hope that day comes soon. Early enough for you to save yourself, but late enough that you learn that lesson the hard way.
Weak ass drug addicts. Lol. Learn some fucking self control!
Eminem is an undefeatable rapper dats it
Tom Olson overcoming weakness is a way to strengthen resolve. In that sense an addict is stronger than you in every sense of the word. Thank you for pointing that out.
You might want to learn some self control of your own. Comments like these statuses just verify my theory about you
